{"id":278222487,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 years, 6 months","timestamp":1573577805,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"772 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/278222487/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"122.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& num) {\n        set<vector<int> >rs;\n        sort(num.begin(), num.end());\n        int i, j, k;\n        int n = num.size();\n        for (i = 0; i < n - 2; i++) {\n            j = i+1;\n            k = n-1;\n            while (j < k) {\n                int sum = num[i] + num[j] + num[k];\n                if (sum == 0) {\n                    vector<int> tmp(3);\n                    tmp[0] = num[i];\n                    tmp[1] = num[j];\n                    tmp[2] = num[k];\n                    rs.insert(tmp);\n                    j++;\n                    k--;\n                } else if (sum > 0) {\n                    k--;\n                } else if (sum < 0) {\n                    j++;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        vector<vector <int> >result (rs.begin(), rs.end());\n        return result;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false}
